title: [SOLVED]820-3115 Boot loop no chime
message:
Got a 820-3115 thats so very nearly posting, But just as it initialises RAM the machine turns off and starts again. The CPU core drops to 0.8V as it should just before post.
It had a tiny amount of liquid damage near the SPI, but ive reflashed it and no difference was noted. If the ram is removed the system remains on and gives a single beep.

title: [SOLVED]820-3115 Boot loop no chime
message: Is this with or without an LCD connected?

title: [SOLVED]820-3115 Boot loop no chime
message: Issue is without the LCD connected, board out, no peripherals connected/ board only.

title: [SOLVED]820-3115 Boot loop no chime
message: Could be many things. Check corrosion under SMC/PCH and around clock chip.

title: [SOLVED]820-3115 Boot loop no chime
message: Ive checked all of that, No signs of corrosion, i ultrasonic-ed it, no change, ive now reflown the SMC and PCH, again no change.

title: [SOLVED]820-3115 Boot loop no chime
message: I would look around U7400 and the FETs. AXG voltage coming on too?

title: [SOLVED]820-3115 Boot loop no chime
message:
Missing R7554, Assume some moron had ripped it clean off, not something i was looking out for.
Solved, Thanks Duke
